name: Belong
description:
With luck, you secured yourself a part-time job. With time, you might get more than you bargained for.

  • Customisable main character name, gender and personality options!
  • 3 romanceable paths ( 2 Males & 1 Female )!
  • No stats build up!
  • Over 52,500 words of content!

Your first encounter was a sticky situation. Fortunately, it didn’t stick for long. Time to time you find the familiar red jacket within your sights.
Will you take the time to sit down and know him?

The chary make-up artist rather let his works speak for himself. Will you stay by his side and hear the bubbling words he struggles with?

Smiles grace her lips, her rose tinted glasses adorns her lovely face.
You can’t help but wonder what lies underneath them.

 ✧｡٩(ˊᗜˋ)و✧*｡ Brought to you by
